name: 2.5D Platformer (TransGame668)
description:
There a 9 level and all unlocked in it. You playing as Red and White Capsule, Find the pile of treasure to win the game, In several level there a key object that can able to unlock the temporary wall. Just jumping and don't fall, But the Player will be respawn without start them over when you fall, In level 9 try to jump as fast as you can, cause there a pointing terrain that would make you stuck in the scene. Restart Button showing in top right corner.

Controls: "A" for Left, "D" for Right or Use Arrow Keys.

Music by frankum (freesound.org)
